name: 4th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies
content: Call for paper 4th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies (AIAAT 2020) Aug. 7-9, 2020/Shenzhen, China http://aiaat.org/ 4th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies (AIAAT 2020)will be held in Shenzhen, China from Aug.7 to 9, 2020, which is organized by Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers (HKSME), sponsored by Xidian University, York Univeristy, Donghua University, Fudan University. We warmly welcome prospective authors to submit your research papers to AIAAT 2020, and share your latest research results and valuable experiences with other top-scientists, engineers and scholars from all over the world. ●Publication and Indexing All accepted and registered papers will be included in Conference Proceeding, which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec, and other databases. \*Selected papers with high quality will be recommended to publish in the Special Issue of "Smart Sensors and Devices in Artificial Intelligence", which is a special issue of Sensors (ISSN 1424-8220), indexed by SCIE, EI, Scopus. Impact Factor: 2.475\. #The Conference Proceeding of AIAAT 2019 was be IOP Conference Series: Materials Science and Engineering. ●Topics of interest for submission include, but are not limited to: Artificial Neural Networks Bayesian Networks Bioinformatics Neuroinformatics Robotics Reasoning and Evolution Fuzzy Logic and Methods Machine Learning Multiagent Systems More topics can be found at: http://aiaat.org/cfp.html ●Paper Submission 1\. You can choose to submit your paper directly to aiaat@smehk.org 2\. You can submit your full paper through electronic submission system: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/AIAAT2020 ●Call for participants 1.Presenter: If you are interested in presenting your research on the conference, without publishing your paper in the proceeding, please submit the abstract to us. 2.Listener: You need to complete the registration as Listener before the registration deadline.Send email to aiaat@smehk.org for further information. 3.Reviewer: We sincerely welcome experts in the areas of Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies join the conference as reviewer .Contact us at: aiaat@smehk.org ●Contact Us: Ms.Amber Cao Tel : +852-30506862 +86-18200296850 Email: aiaat@smehk.org Website: http://aiaat.org/ Wechat: HKSME15756362251
organizers: Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers (HKSME)
